member.name: IWICStream.InitializeFromFilename
member.summary: Initializes a stream from a particular file.
member.param: The file used to initialize the stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICStream.InitializeFromIStream
member.summary: Initializes a stream from another stream. Access rights are inherited from the underlying stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICStream.InitializeFromIStreamRegion
member.summary: Initializes the stream as a substream of another stream.
member.param: The stream offset used to create the new stream.
The maximum size of the stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICStream.InitializeFromMemory
member.summary: Initializes a stream to treat a block of memory as a stream. The stream cannot grow beyond the buffer size.
member.param: Pointer to the buffer used to initialize the stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICStream
member.summary: Represents a Windows Imaging Component (WIC) stream for referencing imaging and metadata content.
